Desmond Olumuyiwa Majekodunmi bụ onye Naijiria na-ahụ maka gburugburu obodo.  Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Lekki State Urban Forest and Animal Shelter Initiative (LUFASI), na onye na-eme ihe ngosi redio nke Green Hour na Nigeria Info 99.3 FM. Majekodunmi bụkwa onye odee, onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede edemede
Na mgbakwunye na nke a, ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ ugbo, onye injinia / onye na-emepụta ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-agu egwu.
Ọ natala ọtụtụ onyinye maka ọrụ ya n' ọrụ ugbo na gburugburu

O meriri na Nigerian Silverbird TV "Man of the Year" na DW German TV network "Environment Hero". Mgbalị ya iji kụọ osisi ndị ọzọ ka e ji onyinye sitere n'aka Ministri nke Gburugburu obodo kwado ya.Ọ bụ onye ọrụ ugbo nwere asambodo nye  International Institute of Tropical Agriculture (IITA), Ibadan ma na-arụkwa  ọrụ Majekodunmi Agricultural Project (MAP), ugbo nchekwa nke agro forestry dị na Lagos.
Ọ bụ nwa nke onye isi ala nke mba mbụ bụ Chiif Moses Majekodunmi na nwunye ya Nora Majekodunmi, onye guzobere ụlọakwụkwọ Corona.
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, ọ natara onyinye site n'aka Paschal Dozie mgbe o nyere nkụzi  banyere mmepe na-adịgide adịgide ma natalarị ọtụtụ onyinye ndị ọzọ gbasara mgbanwe ihu igwe na nchedo gburugburu
Majekodunmi na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi oche ugbu a nke kọmitii Awareness and Fund Raising nke Nigeria Conservation Foundation (NCF), Lagos, ọ bụkwa onye na-arụ ọrụ ugbo nchekwa.
